Conditions.Description: Cancellation of the vehicle subject to the following: - The Vehicle registration has been cancelled. - The Vehicle registration has been cancelled. - The Vehicle’s Ownership is transferred to another owner. - Another Insurance policy is issued from another Insurance Company in replacement of this policy. - Submit all original Insurance documents such as certificate of Insurance and card.
Conditions.Short_description: Cancellation of the vehicle subject to the following: - The Vehicle registration has been cancelled. - The Vehicle registration has been cancelled. - The Vehicle’s Ownership is transferred to another owner. - Another Insurance policy is issued from another Insurance Company in replacement of this policy. - Submit all original Insurance documents such as certificate of Insurance and card.
